title: Handle a Pilot Ladder Safety Check
description: A pilot is about to board an inbound vessel, but they report that the vessel's pilot ladder appears unsafe.

tasks.description: The pilot contacts the VTS operator via radio to report an unsafe ladder and refuses to board.
tasks.expected_outcome: VTS operator logs the report of the safety issue.

tasks.description: The VTS operator communicates the issue to the vessel master, instructing them to rig the ladder correctly according to SOLAS regulations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The VTS operator relays the safety requirements to the vessel.

tasks.description: The pilot waits until the ladder is re-rigged safely, inspects it again, and then proceeds to board, with the delay being logged.
tasks.expected_outcome: The issue is resolved, the pilot boards safely, and the delay is recorded against the vessel's performance record.
